comments.name: Milos Veljkovic
comments.comment: The material is well organised and very easy to understand. The instructor goes to the point, keep focus on main concept, good pace.

comments.name: Maxim Looije
comments.comment: I liked following the evolution of his examples, from getting the stuff running to the recommended final versions through the refactoring steps.

comments.name: Adrian Zawadzki
comments.comment: Great Course and would have even better if there is some textual presentation with core concepts along with oral explanation and also interview questions and answers

comments.name: Alexander Kozlovich
comments.comment: Really good course. It helped me a lot in understanding core principles of react and how build an app from scratch. Definitely best course out there
